abstract: Emma Watson, star of the Harry Potter movie franchise, will star in The Perks of Being a Wallflower, adaptation of 1999 coming-of-age novel; role is closest Watson has come to playing a contemporary character and provides her with a chance to experience some youthful American rites that she missed out on working as a young British film star.
snippet: While filming “The Perks of Being a Wallflower,” Emma Watson was able to experience the youthful American rites that she had missed as a British star of the “Harry Potter” franchise.
lead_paragraph: While filming “The Perks of Being a Wallflower,” Emma Watson was able to experience the youthful American rites that she had missed as a British star of the “Harry Potter” franchise.

headline.main: From Wizards to Wallflowers in the Suburbs
headline.print_headline: From Wizards To Wallflowers In the Suburbs
headline.seo: Emma Watson’s Personal Journey to the Suburbs From Hogwarts
